fields.label: Disclaimer
fields.message: If no header layout is selected. Default header will show, with a simple mobile menu on tablets and mobiles.

fields.label: Header Layouts
fields.name: header_layouts
fields.instructions: Choose a Header for your project

sub_fields.label: Disclaimer
sub_fields.message:
Header Layout: Logo Left

Displays logo on the left of the header with the navigation + socials on the right. On desktop and tablet Mobile menu is displayed.

sub_fields.label: Logo
sub_fields.name: logo
sub_fields.instructions: Insert your logo here, we recommend SVG, PNG or JPG

sub_fields.label: Does Menu Item Have Children?
sub_fields.name: has_children
sub_fields.instructions: If Link has an associated sub menu include below.

sub_fields.label: Use existing menu for mobile?
sub_fields.name: select_menu
sub_fields.instructions: Use exisitng menu for mobile or choose a different menu to display on mobile and tablet screens

choices.no: Show a new menu for mobile screens

sub_fields.label: Does Menu Item Have Children?
sub_fields.name: has_children
sub_fields.instructions: If Link has an associated sub menu include below.

sub_fields.label: Show Socials ?
sub_fields.name: show_socials
sub_fields.instructions: Show social links, socials are edited / accessed from the sidebar. Theme Settings > Socials

sub_fields.label: Disclaimer
sub_fields.message: Logo is displayed in the center, with menu toggle on the left and button on the right.

sub_fields.label: Does Menu Item Have Children?
sub_fields.name: has_children
sub_fields.instructions: If Link has an associated sub menu include below.

sub_fields.label: Logo
sub_fields.name: logo
sub_fields.instructions: Insert your logo here, we recommend SVG, PNG or JPG

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button
sub_fields.instructions: Displayed on the right. Defaults to a contact button with /contact link.

sub_fields.label: Show Socials ?
sub_fields.name: show_socials
sub_fields.instructions: Show social links, socials are edited / accessed from the sidebar. Theme Settings > Socials

sub_fields.label: Disclaimer
sub_fields.message:
Header Layout: Mega Menu

Displays logo on the left of the header with the navigation on the right. Each menu item has the option of making it a mega menu dropdown, on each dropdown you have the option for menu columns and a featured image with link On desktop and tablet Mobile menu is displayed with socials.

sub_fields.label: Create Mega menu dropdown?
sub_fields.name: has_children
sub_fields.instructions: If Link has an associated sub menu include below.

sub_fields.label: Does Menu Item Have Children?
sub_fields.name: has_children
sub_fields.instructions: If Link has an associated sub menu include below.

sub_fields.label: Show Socials ?
sub_fields.name: show_socials
sub_fields.instructions: Show social links, socials are edited / accessed from the sidebar. Theme Settings > Socials

fields.label: Header Width
fields.name: header_width
fields.instructions: Give the width of the header component.

fields.label: Reveal Header
fields.name: reveal_header
fields.instructions: When you scroll down hide header, reveal when scrolling up. This is removed on mobile & tablet screens.

fields.label: Show Search Icon
fields.name: show_search
fields.instructions: To show a search icon just select show.
